Name: Skeleton King
Bio: For untold years, King Ostarion built a kingdom from the remains of his enemies. It was an obsessive's errand, done to pass the long eternities of a monarchy that seemed fated never to end. He believed that as long as he built up the towers of his palace, he could not die. But eventually he learned that he had been deluded... that bone itself could perish. Deeply mistrustful of flesh, he sought a more permanent way of extending his reign, and at last settled on pursuit of wraith energy, a form of pure spirit given off by certain dark souls at death. Should he infuse himself with Wraith Essence, he thought he might create a body as luminous and eternal as his ego. On the millennial solstice known as Wraith-Night, he submitted to a rite of transformation, compelling his subjects to harvest enough souls to fuel his ambition for immortality. No one knows how many of his champions died, for the only survivor who mattered was the Wraith King who rose with the sun on the following morn. Now he rarely spends a moment on his glowing throne--but strides out with sword drawn, demanding a fealty that extends far beyond death.

Abilities.affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
Abilities.desc: Wraith King sears an enemy unit with spectral fire, dealing damage and stunning, then dealing damage over time and slowing the target.
Abilities.attribute:
STUN DURATION: 2
SLOW DURATION: 2
MOVEMENT SLOW: 20%
DAMAGE PER SECOND: 20 / 35 / 50 / 65
Abilities.lore: Ostarion calls on his damned lineage, laying waste to his opponents.

Abilities.desc: Nearby friendly units restore health based on the damage they deal when attacking enemy units.
Abilities.notes:
Stacks additively with other sources of Lifesteal.
Can be toggled to make heroes only.
Abilities.lore: Wraith King's blade drains his enemy's essence to feed his aura.

Abilities.desc: Wraith King passively gains a chance to deal bonus damage on an attack.
Abilities.attribute:
HERO CRITICAL DAMAGE: 150% / 200% / 250% / 300%
NON-HERO CRITICAL DAMAGE: 200% / 300% / 400% / 500%
CRITICAL CHANCE: 15%
Abilities.lore: One blow to crush a foe.

Abilities.desc:
Wraith King's form regroups after death, allowing him to resurrect when killed in battle.  Upon death, enemy units in a 900 radius will be slowed.
Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
Abilities.notes:
Wraith King won't revive if he doesn't have enough mana.
If Wraith King has an Aegis and Reincarnation off cooldown, Reincarnation will trigger first.
Revives with full HP and Mana.
Credit for allies whose death was delayed will go to whoever struck the original killing blow.
Wraith Delay affects Wraith King's actual deaths, not Reincarnate deaths.
Abilities.attribute:
REINCARNATION TIME: 3 / 3 / 3
MOVEMENT SLOW: 75%
ATTACK SPEED SLOW: 75
SLOW DURATION: 5
SCEPTER ALLY DEATH DELAY: 7
SCEPTER DEATH DELAY RADIUS: 1200
Abilities.lore: Conspirators against the Wraith King wonder why he never stays dead.
